content.text:
# Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Awards 2021

| best_film      = Belfast
| best_direction = Jane Campion – The Power of the Dog
| best_actor     = Andrew Garfield – tick, tick... BOOM!
| best_actress   = Kristen Stewart – Spencer
| last           = 2020
| next           = 2022
}}
The 20th Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Awards were announced on December 6, 2021. The nominations were announced on December 4, 2021. Belfast and The Power of the Dog led the nominations with 11 each, with the former winning Best Film.
Winners and nominees
, Best Director and Best Adapted Screenplay winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
, Best Original Screenplay winner]]

|-
| valign="top" |
Belfast
* The Green Knight
* The Power of the Dog
* tick, tick... BOOM!
* West Side Story
| valign="top" |
'Jane Campion – The Power of the Dog'
* Kenneth Branagh – Belfast
* David Lowery – The Green Knight
* Steven Spielberg – West Side Story
* Denis Villeneuve – Dune
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
'Andrew Garfield – tick, tick... BOOM! as Jonathan Larson'
* Nicolas Cage – Pig as Robin Feld
* Benedict Cumberbatch – The Power of the Dog as Phil Burbank
* Will Smith – King Richard as Richard Williams
* Denzel Washington – The Tragedy of Macbeth as Lord Macbeth
| valign="top" |
'Kristen Stewart – Spencer as Diana, Princess of Wales'
* Olivia Colman – The Lost Daughter as Leda Caruso
* Lady Gaga – House of Gucci as Patrizia Reggiani
* Nicole Kidman – Being the Ricardos as Lucille Ball
* Tessa Thompson – Passing as Irene Redfield
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Supporting Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
'Kodi Smit-McPhee – The Power of the Dog as Peter Gordon'
* Jamie Dornan – Belfast as Pa
* Ciarán Hinds – Belfast as Pop
* Troy Kotsur – CODA as Frank Rossi
* Jesse Plemons – The Power of the Dog as George Burbank
| valign="top" |
'Aunjanue Ellis – King Richard as Oracene "Brandy" Price'
* Caitríona Balfe – Belfast as Ma
* Ariana DeBose – West Side Story as Anita
* Ann Dowd – Mass as Linda
* Kirsten Dunst – The Power of the Dog as Rose Gordon
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Original Screenplay
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Adapted Screenplay
|-
| valign="top" |
'Belfast – Kenneth Branagh'
* ''C'mon C'mon – Mike Mills

* Licorice Pizza – Paul Thomas Anderson
* Mass – Fran Kranz
| valign="top" |
'The Power of the Dog – Jane Campion'
* CODA – Sian Heder
* Dune – Eric Roth, Jon Spaihts, and Denis Villeneuve
* tick, tick... BOOM! – Steven Levenson
* West Side Story – Tony Kushner
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Animated Feature

The Mitchells vs. the Machines

* Flee
* Luca
* Raya and the Last Dragon
| valign="top" |
Summer of Soul (...Or, When the Revolution Could Not Be Televised)
* The First Wave
* Flee
* The Rescue

Drive My Car
* A Hero
* Lamb
* Titane
* The Worst Person in the World
| valign="top" |
'Dune – Greig Fraser'

* The Green Knight – Andrew Droz Palermo
* The Power of the Dog – Ari Wegner

'tick, tick... BOOM! – Myron Kerstein and Andrew Weisblum'

* The French Dispatch – Andrew Weisblum
* The Power of the Dog – Peter Sciberras
| valign="top" |
'Dune – Hans Zimmer'
* Cyrano – Aaron Dessner and Bryce Dessner

* Belfast – Jim Clay (production designer); Claire Nia Richards (set decorator)
* The French Dispatch – Adam Stockhausen (production designer); Rena DeAngelo (set decorator)
* Nightmare Alley – Tamara Deverell (production designer); Shane Vieau (set decorator)

Mass
* Belfast
* The French Dispatch
* The Harder They Fall
* The Power of the Dog

* Jude Hill – Belfast as Buddy
* Emilia Jones – CODA as Ruby Rossi
* Saniyya Sidney – King Richard as Venus Williams
* Rachel Zegler – West Side Story as María Vasquez
| valign="top" |
'Awkwafina – Raya and the Last Dragon as Sisu'
* Stephanie Beatriz – Encanto as Mirabel Madrigal
* Abbi Jacobson – The Mitchells vs. the Machines as Katie Mitchell
* Kelly Marie Tran – Raya and the Last Dragon as Raya
* Jacob Tremblay – Luca as Luca Parugo
